meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #565.

td.p: Mary Hammond, a homemaker originally from Kansas City, Missouri
Susan Kaisler, a French teacher from Mesa, Arizona
Joel Nathanson, a dentist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 3-day cash winnings total $20,801)

tr.td: CELEBRITY TRADEMARKS
TRAVEL & TOURISM
SPORTS
DANGEROUS ANIMALS
GIRLS IN SONG
"YANKEE"s

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joel
Susan
Mary
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Mary: Are you sure it\'s not the Nile?)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Well, you see, this is one of those situations where you had to think about it a little. One of these places is in Missouri, the other one is just south of St. Louis, and Memphis of course is in Tennessee and the right river is the [*]. The Nile is of course much longer than 2300.)
JoelWhat is the Nile?
$100
SusanWhat is the Nile?
$300
MaryWhat is the Nile?
$1,400
Mississippi')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Alexandria, Herculaneum & Memphis can be found on banks of this 2348-mile-long river')
